solution.text:
When the triangle is revolved about side \(_{j}_\) cm, a cone is formed with base radius \(_{j}_\) cm and height \(_{k}_\) cm.
Radiius, r\(=_{j}_\,cm\)
Height, h\(=_{k}_\,cm\)
Volume of the cone\(=\frac13 \pi r^2h\)
\(=\frac13 \pi \times _{j}_^2 \times _{k}_\)
\(=_{{trunc(((1/Decimal(3))*pi_val*j**2*k),3)}}_\,cm^3\)

content.text:
Consider a right angled triangle with side \(_{j}_\) cm, \(_{k}_\) cm and \(_{{trunc(((j**2+k**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\) cm.
If the triangle is revolved about side \(_{j}_\)cm, find the volume of the solid formed.
